text_block_list.text:
On a day off sometime after I had decided to learn more about 
partying for Daitaku Helios' sake―― I was wandering around the 
city when I heard a lively voice.

text_block_list.name: Gyaru A
text_block_list.text:
Crazy～!! They seriously put a 
parfait on top of a whole cake!

text_block_list.name: Gyaru B
text_block_list.text:
Bring on the calories! 
Better get a pic now☆

It was a store overflowing with Gyaru-looking girls. It seemed 
like it would be a good topic of discussion with Daitaku Helios, 
so I was going to take a look――

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Oh, that's unexpected～! Trai-pi, what's up?
choice_data_list: I was curious about the menu

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
Menu? ……Ah! Trai-poyo, you came here to challenge 
that wicked huge cake solo, didn't you!?

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
You're goin' really hard at that 
party trainin' huh!? Mad respect!!

That wasn't what I was doing though―― I just wanted to understand 
more about Daitaku Helios and her love for partying.
choice_data_list: (Guess it wouldn't hurt to try though)

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
Ah! This is everyone's first time meetin' Trai-poyo, right!? 
I'll introduce them! Listen to this～!

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
This person is my trainer! And, they're aimin' 
to be a party animal☆ Hope you get along～!

text_block_list.name: Gyaru A
text_block_list.text:
Eh, awesome! A party animal that's a trainer!? 
So a party Trainer!

text_block_list.name: Gyaru B
text_block_list.text:
Wanna try some～? 
It'll blow you away～!

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Eat some～ just like bang bang boo～m☆

And so, together with Daitaku Helios and her friends, 
I challenged that wicked huge cake parfait―

text_block_list.name: Everyone
text_block_list.text: Ate it all we～i☆

text_block_list.name: Gyaru A
text_block_list.text:
Well then, chan-Heli, 
we're gonna go do some training-!

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
Wei wei! Sounds good-! 
Give it all you got-!!

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
So? Trai-pippi, what're you gonna do now? 
Heading back to school?
choice_data_list: Take a break. Ate too much……

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
Got it☆ Then, after that, wanna hang out with me? 
I'll show ya a cool new spot!

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
For Trai-pi's cosmetics～…… it's gotta be this! 
Since we decided on blue for your First Look!

text_block_list.name: Gyaru C
text_block_list.text:
Ah～! Heli-poyo, on a date!? 
Livin' it up, huh!?

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
Got that right-! A party date!! 
Wanna help me get Trai-pi all decked out?

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
We'll grab some make up from here, get you all coordinated, 
and then hit the club like boom boom boom～☆

text_block_list.name: Gyaru D
text_block_list.text:
Sounds fun～! Let me join in～! 
I'm wicked good at doing make up!

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
You're a godsend～! Things're looking good, Trai-poyo! 
Can't do this without the right look☆

After that, with the help of Daitaku Helios 
and her friends, at the very least on the outside 
I was closer to living the party life―

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
Uwahahahaa! It's DJ Helios' 『Sick☆Paka↑Mix』～☆ 
Party hard y'all～!!

text_block_list.name: Club Goer
text_block_list.text:
HEY YO! Helios, just who I was waitin' for! 
Heat it up tonight, and drop the beat!

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
YO YO! You got it☆ Just sit tight, peeps! 
Tonight's gonna be wicked lit, I'll set your hearts afire!
choice_data_list: (I feel like I'm in over my head……)
(I feel like I'm in over my head……)

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
Wei we-i☆ 
Trai-pi, havin' fun～!?

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
Oh, soundin' good! 
Once more, Weiii-☆

The club was overflowing with young people enjoying themselves, 
and at the center of all that stood Daitaku Helios.

Daitaku Helios looked more lively than ever―― As I thought, 
understanding more about the party life would be a plus.
However――

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Oooi-, ya dead～?

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
Trai-pi, you went too hard～! 
Guess the festive mood was too much for ya～

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
You just debuted, remember? 
Just start out by vibin' at your own pace, okay?

Daitaku Helios' smile was so dazzling, I almost felt I had to 
close my eyes. I intended to support her, but it felt like it was 
the other way around……

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
That…… that's crazy～～～～～～!! 
Trai-pi, ain't that crazy!?

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
So you're really for real about aiming to be a party animal, huh? 
You're livin' it up!! Let's keep livin' it up!!

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
Okay, got it! Anyways, let's get started with maxing out those 
vibes! Smash through your limits――!!

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: I'll hang with ya through it all! Check it☆

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
Heee～y everyone-!! 
DJs Helios & Trai-pi are gonna take it from here～☆

text_block_list.name: Party Peeps
text_block_list.text: FOOOOOOO！！！！！

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
Don't worry! I'll show ya the ropes, 
then you just go with the flow, okay!?

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Party life rocks FOO～☆

After that, Daitaku Helios dragged me through a crash 
course as she boosted the mood in the room――

In an attempt to try and keep up, 
I desperately moved my body to the beat.
